public interface Requester

HTTP Request interface

Since:
1.0

Method Summary
 int getConnectionTimeout()
          Returns the timeout in milliseconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.
 Headers getHeaders()
          Returns the HTTP request headers.
 int getReadTimeout()
          Returns the timeout in milliseconds to read data from an established connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.
 Responder send()
          Executes an HTTP request
 void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
          Sets the timeout in milliseconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.

          Sets the HTTP request headers.
 void setReadTimeout(int timeout)
          Sets the timeout in milliseconds to read data from an established connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.
 

Method Detail

setConnectionTimeout

void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
Sets the timeout in milliseconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout. By default it is 20000 (20 seconds)

Parameters:
timeout -

Returns the timeout in milliseconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.

Returns:

setReadTimeout

void setReadTimeout(int timeout)
Sets the timeout in milliseconds to read data from an established connection or 0 for an infinite timeout. By default it is 90000 (90 seconds).

Parameters:
timeout -

Returns the timeout in milliseconds to read data from an established connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.
